thread.section_title: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand | acerentalcars.co.nz
thread.title: Dave Kelshaw
thread.title_full: Ace Rental Cars Australia & New Zealand reviewed by Dave Kelshaw

author: Dave Kelshaw
title: Dave Kelshaw
text: I found the reservation system easy and quick, the pickup to the Wellington Airport off-site depot was efficient and quick, and the vehicle was exactly as described. No mess, no fuss, a very uncomplicated process, especially at dropoff at Auckland Airport, with the shuttle to the terminal making the whole experience perfect. And the price was definitely right too. Thanks Ace!
